123211.content:
Kelly and Nat both decided to get to know each other by going out to eat. They went to IHOP and sat in a booth in the back. The waiter came around to take their orders.

"I'll just have a fruit salad and an OJ." Kelly says.

"I'll have the unlimited pancakes and the sausage links. And the banana smoothie looks good too... Add hash browns and eggs to go with the sausage links please. And a coffee. And a cheesecake." Nat said. The waiter writes the order down and hurries away.

"So you're a cheerleader?" Nat asks.

"Yeah, I'm a cheerleader. I've been one since high school, actually."

"That's cool. I'm a chef in training. Been kind of a dream of mine since I was little. My Dad is a doctor and philanthropist, my Mom's a well known author."

Ten minutes of getting to know each other later, the food arrives. Kelly's one dish is placed in front her with her drink while a giant stack of pancakes followed by other multiple dishes is placed in front of Nat.

"Mm-mm..." Nat moans as she bites into her pancakes. She eats quickly, so quickly it doesn't even look like she is chewing her food. Kelly eats her fruit salad and tries not to stare. Nat finishes her pancakes and calls the waiter for a refill. She eats the rest of her food, slurping the smoothie and gobbling down the eggs, while she waits for her pancakes. The waiter comes back with another stack twice as big and Nat gobbles it down. By now, Kelly has finished eating. Nat finally finishes, and lets out a small burp.

"Excuse me." She giggles. She pats her bloated tummy that rest on her jiggly thighs. "You know, this is a waste of money. I'm gonna get my moneys worth." She flags the waiter and gets four more over sized plates of pancakes. She sets one in front of Kelly. "I know you want more than just a fruit salad."

"But-"

"It's on me!" Kelly gives in and digs in. She actually ends up enjoying the warm pancakes. Nat eats and until not a crumb is left on any of the three plates. He shirt now rises up slightly to show the girth in her belly. She looked like she was in an early pregnancy, her stomach was so tight. Kelly's hardly even bulged.

Nat insisted on paying for them both, and left a big tip for the waiter. She and Kelly left and went back to their dorm room.

Now what?

12323.content:
Now, Linda happened to be a 5'6' red head with a (groan) lean, muscular body. Her breasts were only just into the B cup range, thanks to the 'dreaded' freshman 15 bringing her up to a modest 125lbs. She seemed genuinely passionate about sports, but also an even tempered girl outside of competitive sports. Unfortunately, she also appeared to be horrendously absent minded, having nearly left her handbag behind were it not for Kelly scooping it up at the last minute and handing it back to her. She also was a tremendous tomboy, with her hair sheared nearly to crew cut length, baggy shirt and man jeans (although Kelly suspected that had more to do with a mishap with a boyfriends wardrobe than a preference). The girl also had a round face with blue eyes and a button nose.

"Yeah, you're better off not on the team!" Linda stated, almost insulting Kelly before explaining"Most of the cheerleaders this year fulfil the stereotype in the worst ways. It would've been a nice change of pace to see an actually nice person on the squad."

Kelly decided to not leave Linda hanging "Speaking of the team, why'd you choose to go for the soccer team?" Earning a perplexed look from Linda, "Why not try to be the 'nice person' on the cheer squad?"

Linda laughed loudly, earning the attention of several other pairs. "Honestly, I'm not one to sit on the sidelines cheering, and I'm more 'one of the boys' than anything else."

This didn't surprise Kelly, who took in her ensemble and noted a distinct lack of any form of makeup on the girls face. She wouldn't have managed to make the very stringent appearance protocals and probably would've hated it anyway.

"And here's the campus mess, my favourite place,besides the soccer field." Linda said expansively, earning a look of shock from Kelly as she indicated the large food court. "What? I need a lot of food to keep me running." She said a little defensively.

Kelly couldn't help looking at her tomboy roommate like she was mad. "Why would... what about boys?" Feeling her point was clear.

"Boys? Some of my best friends are boys!" Completely missing the point and also confirming some very dire suspicions that Kelly had about Linda's character.

"I mean, do you like boys?" Kelly rephrased

"Oh!" Linda exclaimed "O-of course, just not all that much." She paused, looking slightly concerned, "I prefer girls, in that way. That's... not going to be a problem. Is it?" She took a slightly pleading expression. "I'm don't force people in that way. I promise."

"I...I see, well, it's more of a surprise than a major problem." Kelly said, a little shaken. At least it was out in the open before something embarrassing happened. However, now Kelly was at a loss for any way to continue the conversation. Fortunately, fate was kind and offered an out in the form of a classically built young man waving a pair of girls jeans above his head.

"Linda!" He called, running towards the pair.

"Nate!" The redhead turned, "Oh, I got our pants mixed up, again."

"Yeah, they must've got switched when we woke up at Ricks." The blonde boy said, handing them over. "Who's your friend?"

"This is Kelly, my roommate!" Kelly waved "Kelly, this is Nathan Balder"

"Just Nate, and the names from norse mythology." The boy, who had a rather thin, long face glanced at Linda "Hey, is she..." He left it trailing,

"Nah, she's just my roommate, for now." Linda turned and grinned at Kelly

"Hey, don't get too many ideas, girl." Kelly, said, eyeing her with mock defensiveness

Nathan adopted a overdone pained expression, "Agh! Well, there go my fantasies." He voice then took a more cautious than jovial note. "I don't suppose if you'd be up for a date with me, if you aren't with Linda?" again adding the last line with a fresh dose of humor.

Kelly giggled, taking a likewise overdramatic thoughtful expression "Hmm, give me your number and I'll get back to you."

The pair shared numbers with Nate saying, "Thanks, you're more fun than Linda's roommate last year."

Obviously this sentence was a mistake, as the atmosphere seemed to drop several degrees after this. Linda's expression hardened, not quite angry but definitely displeased.

"I-I'll be going now!" The boy said quickly before walking away with suspicious swiftness

"What was that about?" Kelly said, turning a questioning eye to the redheaded girl.

"Freshman year roommate, Tabitha Cleane." The tomboy replied with a tersely and with rage disrupted grammar "She wasn't understanding of my... interests and went way out of her way to be nasty, including spreading rumours and messing with my stuff. It got so bad I started only hanging with boys outside of my soccer team." She paused, gathering herself, "I guess that's why I'm not a fan of stereotypical cheerleaders, you might say." She concluded much more calmly.

"Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't know."

Linda waved it off. "It doesn't matter. Anyway, enough deep stuff, it's about lunch time, so I'll buy you something to eat."

"Sure!" Kelly replied.

Kelly had arrived at college eager to join the girls' wrestling team. After a bit of research, Kelly ascertained knowledge of an all female wrestling team on campus. Wearing a black sports bra and gym shorts, Kelly joyfully rushed to the gym were the team was located, her mind was running with images of athletic girls wrestling and working out. Her excitment peaked as she reached the matted room, however Kelly's enthusiaism was swiftly replaced with consternation. What manifested before Kelly wasn't her fantasy female athletes but a room filled with fat girls in bikinis pressing their squishy bodies against each other.

"Um is this the girls' wrestling team?" Kelly asked noticably bewildered causing one of the fatter girls turned towards Kelly and approached her. "Sure is. You looking to join?" asked the obese girl who had long flowing black hair, smooth white skin, and wore a jacket over her bikini with the title captain on it. "Yes I wanna join the wrestling team. So if you could tell me were it is I'd appreciate it." Kelly said. "Well look no further girl, you found it. I'm the captain, name's Sheri." stated the captain reaching her hand out to Kelly. "Wait you mean that 'this' is the wrestling team?" questioned a visibly irritated Kelly. "Yup, we make up the school's illustrious sumo team." Sheri happily answered. "Sumo? Um how do I put this but sumo's not really a sport. I mean you're all fat. There's no way ladies such as yourself could be viewed as athletes." Kelly scoffed. "Hey whats that supposed to mean?" Sheri replied converting her amiability into justified anger. "Heh well everyone knows that fat people are helpless. Especially fat girls like yourself who can barely move. Theres no way that any of you could make it in real wrestling." stated the insolent Kelly. Suddenly all the fat girls gathered behind Sheri who than challenged Kelly. "Oh really! Her arms were laden with hanging flab, her belly was massive and covered her bikini bottom, her thick legs were wobbly but held her heavy body, her wide ass, graced with cellulite, stretched her tight bikini, and then there was her enormous bust staring Kelly right in the face. 131.content:
Kelly had been overweight for most of her life. Her mother had made excuse after excuse about how she would grow out of her chubbiness, or that it was all just puppy fat that would melt away when she got through puberty. The pounds had refused to budge, and by the time she was thirteen, there was no other excuse Kelly's mother could make. Her daughter was fat. Her thighs rubbed together when she walked, and her belly jiggled with every step she took. Matters weren't helped by the fact Kelly had a love for food. Rich food, fast food, sweet food, there wasn't a single food type she disliked. Kelly would happily wolf down salads, her problem was that she simply had too much of it.

All of that changed the very next summer, when Kelly's mother sent her to fat camp. Kelly returned slimmer, with a reduced appetite, and an almost distaste for the food she once loved. The pounds continued to come off over the next few years, revealing a lean, toned body underneath the flab; a lot of the boys who had once tormented her for being fat were suddenly interested, and the girls who used to make fun of her behind her back were suddenly whispering in jealousy instead. For all intents and purposes, being thin had changed Kelly's life for the better.

But there was something still missing. Despite herself, Kelly couldn't bring herself to be happy.

At seventeen years old, Kelly stood at 5'4, weighing a fairly average 126lbs. She wore her dark brown hair long, two lone curls falling either side of her grey-blue eyes. Her skin was a little pale, and mostly flawless. She sighed as she tucked several strands of hair back behind her ear, gazing up at the student accommodation that was to become her home for the next three years. She was nervous, she had never been away from home before, and her parents had dropped her off at the train station just hours ago. She sighed, chiding herself for acting so childish, and slung her bag over her shoulder as she made her her way into the building.

By the time she had gotten to the fifth floor, she was only just out of breath, her eyes glancing from door to door to try and find the apartment she would be sharing. On finding it, she retrieved the key she had been given, and pushed open the door. Right before her eyes was her room mate who she would be spending the rest of the year with. She was..

All her baked goods were loaded with calories and even her meals were quite filling. Growing up, Kelly avoided much of her grandmother's tempting goodies. This was not Kelly's finest moment. Finals were almost over. One test left. If only she could get to class. She found herself on the floor of her dorm room struggling to put on a pair of tights. They have been her go to pants for the semester and it didn't look like they'd last the semester. She had managed to get them up over her swollen thighs, though the fabric stretched so much it didn't leave much to the imagination. Her ass, her largest feature, was far too mammoth to get the pants around. She struggled with little progress. Sucking her stomach in was an exercise in futility. This was not a proud moment for Kelly.

Her only success came when she lifted her belly to rest over the tights. Only then was there barely enough room for her titanic ass. Running late, she rushed out the door. If she was slim and in shape, she'd make it in no time, however, being as big as Kelly was meant that the walk to class was going to take considerable effort to get there on time. Sweating profusely she made it to class 10 minutes late. All the students were already working on their final exam. Exhausted and stressed, Kelly quickly grabbed her test and plopped down into one of the desks. The speed and impact of her ass was more than what Kelly's tights could handle. And within a split second, Kelly's tights split right down the rear. Kelly first heard the ripping of fabric followed by the slack of her clothes give way. Her underwear exposed for all to see. The students erupted in laughter and snickers as the teacher, who was unaware of the situation, tried to calm down the class.

Kelly froze. Not knowing to leave or start the exam. Kelly couldn't concentrate the entire time and the result was a poorly executed exam. Knowing that she failed her final exam, Kelly sought to booze and food to cope. Ignoring that this kind of behavior was the reason why she was in this situation to begin with.

Kelly woke up to a blistering hangover and a buzz from her phone. It was her mother. Christmas this year was going to be at her Grandmothers. When asked what she wanted for Christmas, Kelly's only response was "Clothes!"
14212111111.title: Kelly splits her pants in front of other students

142121111111.content:
Grandma Iris had a big grin on her face as she welcomed Kelly and her family into her home. She could tell that Kelly had been eating well over the semester. And it showed. 29 more pounds made their way to Kelly's body putting her at 282 pounds since the last time Iris saw her. And it showed. Kelly's hips started to inflate so much that her hips started to hang off of chairs more than they were hanging on. Her belly was still quite small in comparison to other features, but it had finally gained some recognition as she was now supporting a double belly. Luckily, her boobs had outpaced her stomach, but just barely at Ds. Her face grew softer, but still mostly maintained her thin physique. Her arms plump with fat and looking like sausages encased in her very tight shirt. Kelly's thighs were so supple, they shook when she walked. And her ass was so large, you could start to see it from the front.

Kelly knew she was in for trouble having to stay the winter break at her grandmothers. She narrowly escaped this summer and now she was back and fatter then ever. Perhaps luckily (or not so) Kelly hadn't weighed herself since she stopped going to the gym at school so she wasn't aware of what damage she had done to herself. But she knew that resisting Iris's fatty treats would take a lot of willpower.

But grandmas are wise. Iris expected Kelly to come back and try to resist her oh so delicious treats. But nobody could resist Iris's strong milkshakes. Boozy calorie laden goodness. They had been a hit at the bakery over the fall and now it was Kelly's turn to try. Initially resistant, Kelly dove in once her grandmother whispered that there was booze inside. It was Kelly's only chance to get alcohol over the holidays with her parents present. Of course Kelly's was a lot boozier than what she sold in her store. Nevertheless, Kelly sucked down the drink and within an hour she was drunk. It was just enough for Kelly to put her guard down and graze upon grandma Iris's baked goods. Kelly was caught in her grandmother's web.

The days continued similarly. Iris would offer up a strong shake and Kelly would slurp it down. Iris would provide fattening foods to binge on and would force feed her and night. Kelly wasn't resistant to the force feeding as Iris often times washed down her food with a second strong shake along with a belly rub that Kelly kind of yearned for over the fall semester.

The strong shakes were near additive to Kelly. While she initially did it for the booze, the taste was something she couldn't get out of her mind. She also started have weird dreams every night. They were usually very foggy, but Kelly would often remember herself getting funnel fed what felt like unlimited amounts of her grandmother's strong shakes as her belly swelled and swelled and swelled. And right as she thought she was going to burst, she would wake up in a cold sweat. It was always a bizarre experience.

By the time Christmas came and Kelly could open her new size 22 clothes, it had been too late. Nothing fit! She had really pigged out this winter. She thought maybe this was a sign that she needed to lose weight, but that was until Kelly opened Iris's gift, which was some brand new stretchy size 26 tights. It was a moment of relief for Kelly as she had something comfortable to wear, though she tried to convince herself that this was just temporary thing and that she'd get her weight under control.

Words don't mean anything if there is no action taken. In Kelly's case, all her weight loss talk was just that. Talk. As Kelly was given some looser clothing, it seems to only expand her appetite. The binging only continued until Kelly had to go back to school.
142121111111.title: Grandma Iris has prepared for Kelly's return

1421211111111.content:
Kelly had been stuffed to the brim over break. She knew she gained weight, but she had no idea what she weighed. She was determined to figure out just how big she got. She hoped she could shock herself into dropping all this weight.

Last summer Kelly was unable to find a scale at her grandmother's though she didn't really do much searching. There was definitely not one in the bathroom or in and of the bedrooms. Kelly searched up and down and just about every room until she spotted a box in the attic labeled "Workout Stuff". She dug through VCR tapes, weights, and bands. Right at the bottom of the box was a scale! Kelly dusted off the digital scale and checked it to see if the batteries still worked. She stepped on it....success! Now for the moment of truth...

ERR

Kelly looked down to see letters instead of numbers. Confused, she stepped off the scale and back on.

ERR

Was it broken? Kelly was sure the ERR meant error. But why? Disappointed, Kelly tossed the scale back in the box.

Who keeps a broken scale anyways? Kelly thought to herself. Had Kelly tested the scale with something else, she would have found that the scale was working fine. She also would have been shocked to find that all her eating over break has been enough to pass the scale's limits. At 302 pounds, Kelly was starting to get really fat.

14212111111111.content:
Going back to school, Kelly had a renewed sense of vigor. After last semester ended in embarrassment, she needed a break from school to recover. Sure she had put on even more weight since last semester, but that was in the past. Time to kick herself into gear for a new semester. Except the ghosts of the fall crept up on Kelly.

Kelly had become famous overnight on campus...for the wrong reasons. As it turns out students had taken film and photos of Kelly, ripped pants and all, during her finals. It was all over the school forums, people recognized her and constantly pointed and giggled. Even some students talking within earshot "Has she gotten even bigger?" "She looks fatter in real life."

Kelly's embarrassment never left her. It only got worse. As classes started, students pulled out their phones when Kelly would sit down for class. They hoped to capture her fatness in real time. Her friends distanced themselves as people got ridiculed for hanging out with her. Kelly was becoming outcasted. In some cases, people would fold to the pressure and put themselves on a crash diet and exercise plan and show up those who once shamed her. But Kelly's response was to retreat to the only thing that made her feel good. Food.

Kelly didn't just retreat to food. She binged. She ate with vigor. Almost as if she was going on a crash diet, but in reverse. Of course Kelly wasn't intentionally trying to eat the school out of food, but eating triggered a happy response in Kelly's mind. She secluded herself from much of the campus as she only came out of her room for food and classes. She found herself getting drunk on weekends and stuffing herself to her limits.

Spring break came and while most students went away to a beach somewhere, Kelly found herself still on campus opting for a much cheaper, but more fattening adventure. With clothes getting tight, she decided to check out the new mall just outside of the college. It was there she discovered the food court. Despite her size, Kelly had never really tried fast food. She tried to resist as she went to the clothing store, but the smells of french fries pulled her in. The rest of the week was a downward spiral. Kelly stopped by each day and ate as much as she could from all the venues. She couldn't help herself. The food was far too comforting.

It didn't help her case that the mall didn't even carry any clothes in her size. She embarrassed herself in front of some store clerks desperately trying to get on a pair of tights up past her thighs. And so Kelly ate.

By semester end, Kelly was pushing 345 pounds and showed no signs of stopping. Now all she needs to do is finish finals and her school year would be over.

Kelly woke up in a haze the day of her finals. The bloated co-ed rolled herself off her bed, her big belly half hanging out of her shirt jiggling furiously as she stuck her landing. "God what time is it?" Kelly asked as she scratched her head, her room starting to finally come into view.

Kelly started to look around for her phone, as it didn't seem like it was morning anymore and she had finals all day today. She tossed the three empty pizza boxes on the floor from her desk, but her phone was not there.

She went back to check her bed, but only found a take out bag from the Mexican place she liked. Now a different concern started to creep into her head. 'What happened last night?' The answer to that she solved when she found an empty handle of rum on the ground next to two bottles of cola.

'Oh shit! Don't tell me I slept through my finals!' Kelly was now franticly looking around for her phone, getting winded from moving so quickly. She finally found it under the XXXL sweater she had on yesterday. 'Damn it's 5 o'clock! I missed everything!' Kelly slunk down on to her desk chair, her booty noticably hanging over both sides. 'I'm so fucked. How did this happen?' Kelly started to look through her phone.

She had called in an order for burritos around dinner time, and the liquor store is right next to that. Then she noticed a call to the pizza place a couple hours later. The last call was to the late night wings place that's open when all else is closed. Kelly found the sheet pan they came in sticky with sauce under her bed.

The worst part was she was already starving again.

"And to think of everything your grandmother went through to put you through school." She sounded quite emotional. "You are going to have to make this right with her." Kelly's mom demanded. Kelly packed up her stuff and her mom dropped her off at her grandmothers, where she was to stay until she repaid her debts. Kelly just imagined how fat she would be by the time that happened.

"Kelly it's so good to see you!" Iris shouted as she did a once over of her wider granddaughter. "You're just in time, I just finished dinner. Come, come." Iris lead Kelly into the kitchen where a very generous meal lay sprawled out on the table.

'There is no use fighting it. I'm already fat, I might as well enjoy while I'm here.' Kelly thought as she plopped down on a sturdy chair. She started munching away as her grandmother constantly refilled her plate.

After the table was cleared Kelly went to her room to unpack. It was at this time her grandmother came to check on her. "Hi sweetie, how's the unpacking going?" She asked her engorged granddaughter. I've been working on my milkshake recipe, don't worry this one doesn't have booze in it, but the other pitcher in the fridge does in case you want it." Iris handed Kelly the gallon sized pitcher of thick milkshake along with a nice wide straw.

Leaving her to continue unpacking, Kelly gladly sucked down the milkshake continuously. It brought back happy memories from Christmas, and it tasted so good Kelly couldn't stop.

When Kelly was done she went back to the kitchen to check on Iris. "All set sweetie?" The caring head of the household asked. "Now that that's done maybe I can interest you in some dessert. Come, come, I just finished a few of your favorites." Again Kelly was led to the table where for starters there was another huge milkshake and a sinful looking chocolate cake. "This is the boozy one." Iris giggled. "And this chocolate cake is to die for."

Kelly started sucking down the milkshake, the booze going straight to her head. As soon as she started to feel a buzz she dove into the moist and rich chocolate cake. She was getting flash backs to all the times over the past semester that she would go hog wild after class and stuff her face, or when she would get drunk on the weekends by herself and eat until she passed out.

She derived pleasure from the decadent indulging, it was the only way she knew how to be happy now, and her grandmother was more that willing to feed that life style.

This was all still new territory for her, and Meg seemed pretty set on what she wanted to do. Was the payoff worth the risk?

1443.title: Another type of girl

choices: Kelly has a lazy, fulfilling summer
Kelly gets a job
Skip to the start of college
145.content:
Finally, sweet, glorious freedom!

With that thought in her mind, Kelly closed her bedroom door. Flicking on the light, she started to get out of her prom dress. Finally, after three years of drudgery, Kelly was finally free of high school, and posed to enjoy her summer, all leading into college.

Going to University was a natural fit for her. Intelligent and hardworking, Kelly had been an honor roll student throughout her high school career, not that it always helped her out on the popularity scene. Still, she'd made solid, lifelong friends, dated a bit (though nothing had really stuck), and survived the grad speeches and prom afterwards. Pulling her black dress down her frame, she looked at herself in the mirror.

Kelly wasn't a tall girl, 5'2" if she was lucky. She had strawberry blonde hair, a cute face, bright blue eyes, and a warm smile. She had an ample set of curves to her, with well rounded hips, a nice ass, and her cup size was easily a C, skirting awful close to a D. Only two parts of her physique betrayed that she was at all above her ideal weight; her thighs were a little rounder then they should have been, and her tummy was certainly soft, though no rolls were apparent.

Still, any such weight was far from noticeable, and given she never worked out or watched what she ate, it was clear she had a very high metabolism. Her build had certainly never caused her any problems dealing with her peers. Eyeing herself in her mirror, and liking what she saw, Kelly looked at her desk and smiled at what was on top; a nearly full box of her favorite cookies, bakery fresh home made Oreo's.

She'd developed quite a snack habit in the stress and run up to exams, absolutely none of it healthy. Pop, chips, cookies, cake, ice cream, fast food, you name it, she was scarfing it down while studying. Kelly was quite happy that she'd not gained a pound during what was essentially an extended binge throughout her last few weeks of high school.

Sitting in her computer chair, Kelly popped open the box. Grabbing a cookie and biting into it with a soft coo, she quickly finished the first and grabbed another. Then another. And another, all the while justifying it to herself. I know I shouldn't eat these before bed, but they are so good! And I worked really hard the last while, so I totally deserve this. Besides, supper was so long ago, and all they had at the dance were snacks like chips and cocktail wieners. If I didn't eat now, I'd be starving. And I really don't want these cookies to go stale.

Conscience assuaged, Kelly finished off the box, licking a finger in order to wipe up all the crumbs from the bottom. Grunting only slightly as she got out of her chair, she laid back in her bed and rubbed her stomach, which was currently hard with nearly a full dozen cookies. Kelly drifted off to sleep, her body used to her large, pre-bedtime binges.

******

As Kelly slept unaware, a soft gurgle came from her hardworking tummy. Her brain was sending signals throughout her body. She was done growing, and her overcharged metabolism was at long last beginning to slow down...
145.title: The End of High School

choices: One week before college
One day before college
Other
1451.content:
Kelly had plans for her summer. Lazy ones.

With her Dad working as a stock broker and her Mom as a lawyer, Kelly didn't need to work over her summer to afford her place at school, so she decided to take it easy for the next few months before she had to study again. The fact she had the house to herself because of her parents' busy work schedules was an added bonus.

Still, there were certain rules she had to follow; namely, if she made a mess, she had to clean it up. This, combined with her inability to cook, and the credit card her parents paid for her, meant Kelly was eating out for almost every meal. A day that involved McDonald's for breakfast, Taco Bell for lunch, delivery pizza for supper, and a burger run or two in between meals became fairly commonplace. Kelly also made sure the kitchen was permanently stocked with junk food of all varieties for snacking on while she lazed around the house.

And laze around she did. Laying by the pool, soaking in an inflatable, watching a movie or playing a game inside, Kelly almost never moved, save to get more food. With the exception of her food runs, she never wore any clothes other then her bikini, and even then would usually just throw a t-shirt and some sweat pants over top of her swimwear when she went out.

It was perhaps because of the string bikini and stretchy clothes that Kelly failed to notice her body's slow accumulation of fat. As her metabolism slowed, the divide between needed and excess calories began to grow, and her once stable physique was at risk. So far, her thighs and bottom were the sole receivers of her newfound pudge, hiding from the rest of her just what was coming due to her poor choices.

And so, Kelly's summer went by as a perpetual feast. The only change she noticed was a nice, golden tan, until one day...
1451.title: Kelly has a lazy, fulfilling summer

choices: "155 point 2 pounds."
"161 point 7 pounds."
14511.content:
Oh, c'mon, just snap together, damn it!

That thought went through Kelly's mind for the dozenth time as she tried and failed to do up her jeans. With only a week to go before school, Kelly had decided to make a run to the mall, and grab a few items she'd need for college. This was the first time she's tried to put on proper pants since her holidays had started, and the wavy haired blonde was running into an unforeseen problem. Kelly was certainly getting frustrated.

This is ridiculous! Why is this so hard!? Did these pants shrink in the wash or something!? There's no way I gained that much weight over the summer! Kelly thought, though in the back of her mind, she was starting to worry that she had.

Had Kelly been more observant, or more conscious of the world around her, she probably would have noticed her gradual gain. She certainly wouldn't have wondered why she gained, as the reasons were quite obvious; namely, a combination of a complete lack of exercise, and the sheer number of calories she consumed in a given day. She also should have noticed a growing dent in the deck chair by the pool as her ass grew and grew. And then there was her computer chair. Her hips now touched the arms of the chair as she sat in it, and her large ass kept her further forward in the chair then she'd previously sat, as well as creating a large groove in the material of the seat.

Giving up with an irritated grunt, Kelly eyed her evil pants in the mirror. Without her trying to pull the two halves of the material together, her flesh kept them as far apart as it was possible to get. It was fairly obvious that there was no way she was going to be able to do these pants up. And they were tight! Granted, they'd always been tight on her, but now they seemed to fit Kelly like a second skin.

Kelly eyed the opening in her pants where her flesh bulged out. The skin was still smooth and lacked any rolls, but it was clear as she turned to the side that her tummy now protruded a little from her rib cage. As she turned to the side, she finally got her first good view of her ass since the start of summer holidays, and it was quite an eyeful. She'd always been a big bottomed girl, but her badonkadonk had never stuck out quite that far before. Round and firm, her butt cheeks were still very tight, their new size evident now that she was looking. With her wider looking hips and rounder thighs, there was no question; Kelly had definitely put on weight over the summer.

Still, it can't all be me. Yeah, I probably got a little bigger, sure, but at least some of this must be from shrinkage. No way I gained that much in just four months, Kelly thought. There was only one way to be sure. And so, after taking a moment to remove her pants (freeing her poor, constricted thighs from their too-tight confinement), Kelly went to the bathroom to step on the scale.

She turned on the scale, and waited on the prompts.

"Hello," it said. She looked at herself in the mirror.

"Ready," it said. As Kelly stepped on, she saw how her panties were stretched nearly to the breaking point.

"Calculating," the scale intoned in its simple monotone. As if to add insult to injury, Kelly's stomach let out a hungry growl that seemed far too loud for such a small space.

The scale dinged to indicate it was done, and Kelly held her breath as she waited on her results. "...
14511.title: One week before college

choices: What about breakfast?
To the mall
145112.content:
Kelly's eyes nearly bugged out of her head at those words. There is no way that's right!

Stepping off the scale, Kelly reset it to try again, firm in her belief that it was a mistake. As she stood on the scale waiting for the verdict, she looked at her wider hips in the mirror, and the straining cloth barely keeping her decent. Once again, her stomach let out a loud rumble, pointing out that Kelly was normally on her second breakfast sandwich by now.

"161 point 8 pounds," the scale said in a tone that seemed almost mocking to Kelly's ears. The poor girl was almost shocked to a standstill.

How!? How did I gain over sixteen pounds in four months!? Kelly's rumbling stomach was all the answer she was given, or needed. She did a quick bit of mental math, coming up with four pounds a month, and blatantly ignoring that her holidays were in reality closer to 3 months and a week, which meant her per month gain was actually higher.

Okay, this stops today! I knew I was indulging a bit, but to gain that much... Kelly thought, facing away from the mirror and looking over her shoulder, giving her newly enlarged rear a squeeze. This is crazy. Okay, calm down. It's not too late. You can fix this. First things first, you've got to start eating less, and healthier. Her stomach growled in protest to management's cruel and unusual demand.

You shut up! You're the reason we're in this mess!

Kelly walked back to her room, continuing her mental checklist. And I'm going to have to start exercising. Kelly dreaded the thought of the sweaty, breathless spectacle she would be when she started working out. She'd dropped out of gym in grade 10 the moment they let her, but if exercise would help her shed her unwanted poundage, then so be it.

Getting back to her room, she looked at her pants on the floor. No way those will fit now, she thought as she dug out her trusty sweats. Those still fit just fine; she'd have to get a lot bigger before she outgrew these babies. Luckily for her, she hadn't put on any weight above her waist, so her shirts still fit just fine. She added new underwear and pants to her shopping list. While she fully intended to lose the weight, she couldn't go to college without clothes that fit. She decided she'd also grab some exercise clothes for the campus gym.

Get in shape, and stay in shape! No more slacking off!

Kelly repeated this mantra as she finished getting ready to head out. Grabbing her purse and keys, she headed out the door and hopped in her car.
145112.title: "161 point 7 pounds."

Kelly fails her diet plan
1451121.content:
Kelly was halfway to the mall when, by instinct, she turned into her local McDonald's drive thru.

Gah! That's not what I meant to do! Kelly thought as another vehicle pulled up behind her, blocking her exit. Darn it! Now what!?

As she got closer to the speaker box, Kelly's stomach let out a loud growl, reminding her just how hungry she was. Unfortunately for her, Kelly had precious little will power where her appetite was concerned. Well... I am already here. And I really should eat breakfast. Besides, it's not like it's junk food.

As she pulled up to the speaker and rolled down her window, the clerk's voice sounded through. "Hi! Welcome to McDonald's, can I take your order?"

Kelly was about to order her usual when she thought, You know, if I'm going to start dieting tomorrow, I should splurge a little. Enjoy my last free day while I can.

"Could I get three sausage McGriddles, three potato patties, and a large coffee, two cream, three sugar?" Her spoiled stomach growled its approval at the up-sized order.

After paying for and receiving her food, Kelly drove to the mall, eating the whole way there, and finishing off her sandwiches while she was parked in the lot. Given her usual order was only two sandwiches and no potatoes, she was feeling rather stuffed when she peeled herself out of her car. Oof. Okay, that was a lot, even for me. Still, it's fine for today. Today is a cheat day. I'll work all this off tomorrow.

Kelly walked inside, gingerly cradling her overstuffed belly. Well, time to get some shopping done...

******

As night fell, Kelly winced as she took her clothes off and got ready for bed. She looked at her overfed tummy in the mirror. It was rock hard, and had entered full blown food-baby territory.

As she had shopped, Kelly couldn't help but notice the smells of the food court. Despite how much she'd eaten for breakfast, she found herself all but drooling at the aromas, and her stomach began to growl only a couple hours after she'd finished eating. Well, if today is going to be a cheat day, I might as well go whole hog with it...

And she certainly had at that. She'd had two lunches in the food court, spaced about two hours apart. Later, she'd met up with her friends at a local All-You-Can-Eat Buffet, where she managed to scarf down four plates of food over as many hours, including two pieces of pie and ice cream for dessert. As if that wasn't enough, she stopped at Dunkin' Donuts on her way back home and bought an assorted dozen. She'd managed to eat half the box before she got home, and was finally too stuffed to continue. Leaving them on the counter for the morning, she'd made her way upstairs to her room to get ready for bed.

Kelly groaned softly as she felt her stone-like belly. For once, the noisy organ was silent, packed to the brim as it was with grease, fat, and sugar. Now that was a last stuffing, Kelly thought as she turned off the light and gently laid back in her bed. As she drifted off to sleep, Kelly thought about the donuts downstairs. Technically, her diet started tomorrow, But it's fine. Those will count as today's, not tomorrow's. I'll finish those off, then I'll be good from now on.

******

As Kelly slept, her stomach let out a soft gurgle.
1451121.title: What about breakfast?

choices: Kelly arrives at her dorm
Nothing fits on moving day!
14511212.content:
Kelly's intentions failed almost as fast as she'd made them.

Getting up in the morning, she'd promptly made her way downstairs and finished off the last six donuts, counting them as yesterday's calories, and swearing she'd be good from now on.

That lasted maybe a full hour, if we're feeling generous. Kelly's stomach quickly worked through the empty calories and sugary coatings of the pastry, and began to growl for something of more substance. Kelly tried to ignore her hunger pains, but they refused to be silenced. And as she thought about it, there was still all the snacks she'd stuffed her parents' cupboards with. They certainly weren't going to eat it. It'd just go bad if she didn't.

Well... I did already pay for them, and it would really be a shame to just waste them all. And there's only a week of holidays left before the start of college. It's supposed to be a vacation, right? So, I might as well do and eat as I want right now, right? I mean, the damage has already been done, it's not like I'm going to gain so much more in just a week. And I've already got some new exercise clothes, so I can just start hitting up the campus gym once I get to campus. So, I might as well enjoy myself while I can!

And so Kelly kept along as she'd been this whole time, eating and snacking while sitting on her unexercised tush in her string bikini. None of her daily binges were as large as her so called cheat day, but if anything, that was a hindrance, not a boon to her weight loss plans. Because she didn't eat as much as she had then, she had the means to give herself a false positive. Sure, two McGriddles might seem like a lot, but at least it's not three...

If one thing had changed in the final week of her holidays, it was the number of times Kelly went to bed with a sore stomach. She'd bought a lot more junk food then she'd given herself credit for, and she really didn't want to waste any of it. And so, she spent her evenings snacking non-stop while watching her favorite movies, pushing herself just before the end to try and shrink the pile just a little bit more. Even with her natural ability to ignore the worst aspects of her unchecked gluttony, she knew this was not a good idea on her part. But, Kelly reasoned, it would only be for a couple of days, then the junk food would be gone, and she'd be going to campus.

Yes, she thought, Everything will get back on track then.
14511212.title: Kelly fails her diet plan

choices: ... have a couple slices to be polite
... eat to my heart's content
145112121.content:
Kelly let out a huff as she hung the last of her shirts, and slid her last empty suitcase under her bed. There! All done!

Kelly's dorm was a six bedroom apartment style, located off campus. Each apartment had a large communal bathroom, living room, and kitchen, but each bedroom was private. This, as far as Kelly was concerned, made the place absolutely perfect. The only downside she had was the fact that her apartment was on the 13th floor.

I'd been planning on taking the stairs as part of my weight loss program, but that's a lot of stairs to climb a couple times a day. And the laundry room is in the basement... No, I'll just use the elevator. Save my working out for the gym.

Thinking of the gym, Kelly broke out her campus map. Her dorm had a bus stop just outside the door. From there, it was a short bus ride across the river, where she'd be deposited right at The Corner, which was the name given the patch of the grounds where the Main Office, Dining Hall, and Library met. It was just a short walk to the gym from there.

Another important thing on The Corner was the dining hall itself. While it was expected that people in her dorm would take care of their own cooking, students had the option to apply for the on-campus meal plan if, like Kelly, they had no skills or inclination to cook for themselves. This suited her just fine, and she'd promptly signed up for the meal plan.

In fact, it was almost time for the first campus supper of the year. Grabbing her University bus pass, Kelly put on her coat and headed out the door.

******

Not bad, if a little greasy, thought Kelly as the elevator took her up to the 13th floor.

The dining hall was set up as buffet style, with the kitchen staff constantly restocking trays as the students made their way down the line and emptied them. The selection had certainly been better then she'd been expecting. Ham, roast beef, chicken cordon bleu, quesadillas, those weird "plant" things people ate for some unknowable reason, and the list just kept going from there. Kelly had also learned 2 things rather quickly. One, if you want something, take it, since it probably won't be there when you get back. And two, if you want to go for seconds, you have to go to the very back of the line, so it was best to make sure you got it all the first time.

The end result of this, of course, was that Kelly had heaped her plate with greasy dorm food. Add a couple of pastries, a bowl of pudding, a bowl of jello, a large slice of chocolate cake, and her rather overwhelmed glass of water, she had a monster of a tray when she sat down at her table. More then a couple eyebrows were raised at the mound of food she had in front of her, but if anyone was put off by her gluttony, it was quickly swept under the rug of her bubbly personality. Kelly had always been a friendly and outgoing sort, and could talk to anyone about anything. She was pretty sure a couple of the guys were already hitting on her, and it was only her first day! She was definitely excited at what tomorrow would bring.

A bump in her ride up brought her back to reality, and she held back a grimace as she nursed her packed gut. Her eyes had been bigger then her stomach this time, and though she gave it her all, she just couldn't finish everything she'd taken. Still, she'd made one sizable dent in the pile, and at least managed to avoid wasting any of her desserts. Whether or not that was a good thing is certainly up for interpretation.

At least I can get back to my room, get my clothes off, and stretch out, Kelly thought as she got off on her floor. Fumbling with her key card for just a moment, she opened the door and was greeted by quite the surprise.

It seemed the rest of her room mates had arrived while she was out, and the one girl (a tall, leggy brunette who introduced herself as Susan) had decided to treat the apartment to pizza. And it was quite a spread, with half a dozen extra large pizzas with assorted toppings. Kelly subconsciously groaned at the thought of filling her body with even more calories. She was supposed to be on a diet, after all! Despite its almost painful fullness, her stomach still managed to let out a subdued growl, urging her on, telling her she could fit at least a slice or two in her belly.

I really, really, REALLY shouldn't. It does smell good, though. I think I'll...
145112121.title: Kelly arrives at her dorm

choices: Just one more slice (don't need to make a pig of myself)
Finish the box (three more slices)
1451121211.content:
With a smile, Kelly joined her room mates for a meet and greet over pizza. They all turned out to be really nice girls, and pretty soon, Kelly was joking and laughing with them like they'd been friends for years.

There was only one thing that went wrong that night, and that was Susan had ordered pizza before talking to any of the other girls. Had she done so, she'd have known that three of the six were vegetarians and she wouldn't have ordered five of the six pizzas with meat on them. The end result was that there was a whole pile of pizza just to split between three of the roomies. Kelly tried to hold up her end, but it just wasn't possible. She was simply too stuffed from her campus supper, and only managed to eat four slices over the course of the night.

With most of the pizza being boxed in the fridge for whoever wanted it, the six new friends talked and drank late into the night. Kelly, much to her chagrin, was the first to call it, heading to bed around three in the morning. Locking her bedroom door behind her, she undressed and got ready for bed.

They certainly seemed nice. It'll be great having them as room mates for the year. And that pizza sure was good. Kelly let out a burp as that thought passed through her mind. She rubbed her belly, which was currently as tight as a drum. Not that I needed that. God, there's a lot of leftovers. The fridge is absolutely packed with the stuff.

The curvy blonde laid herself back on the bed with a sigh. She set her alarm for six. I'll hit the gym nice and early, and start working off summer holidays and today.

******

Kelly woke to the sound of her alarm buzzing in her ear. Shutting it off with a yawn, she sat up in bed and stretched like a cat after a long nap. Today was the final weekend before the start of classes, so she should be able to get two days of exercising in before everything gets busy. She'd still have to keep it up after everything did, naturally, but for today she could experiment and take her time in a way she simply wouldn't be able to in the near future.

Hopping out of bed, Kelly took a moment to look at herself in the mirror. Looking good! Okay, yeah, my tush is still a bit lumpy, but it looks like it's already shrinking. Add in some exercise and good food, and the rest of the weight will peel off in no time!

Convinced unconditionally of her claim, Kelly got dressed and threw her gym clothes in a bag. Passing through the kitchen on her way out, her stomach let out its familiar grumble. It's bad to exercise on an empty stomach, isn't it? I should have breakfast first, but the dining hall doesn't open until 8, and I haven't done any grocery shopping yet.

It was then that Kelly remembered the left over pizza in the fridge, and that all the girls claimed it was fair game to whoever wanted it. There is no way pizza for breakfast is part of my diet! But, I am heading to the gym. Any extra calories that gives me can be worked off. And it'll be nice to actually enjoy it, not just force a couple mouthfuls down my throat.

Once she was done justifying it to herself, Kelly dug in the fridge for the loaded pizza. She put two slices on the plate, then thought better of it, and added a third. Putting the plate in the microwave, she heated the food for thirty seconds. Taking advantage of the cooking time to grab herself a glass of water. When the microwave dinged, she took her slices to the kitchen table, and sat down and ate her "breakfast." All too soon, she finished off her plate of leftovers. With the knowledge that she was going to work out and that campus wouldn't be serving breakfast for almost two hours, Kelly decided almost immediately that she'd have a bit more pizza. The question was: how much?
1451121211.title: ... have a couple slices to be polite

choices: Kelly has a light breakfast
Kelly has a "light" breakfast
14511212112.content:
Kelly loaded her plate up with the last three slices from the box and put them in the microwave.

Jesus, girl, are you sure about that? she thought as she put the empty pizza box in the trash. I mean, okay, yes, it is really good pizza, but an entire pizza for breakfast is a tad much. Well, it does clear one of the boxes out of the fridge, which is good. And I'm going straight to the gym. I'll just run some extra laps. Besides, it's a little late to second guess yourself now.

The microwave dinged as she finished that last thought. Kelly ate her next three slices with gusto, and her happy stomach remained silent, enjoying the comfortable feeling of being full. She wished she'd had more time to savor the pizza, but her bus was due any minute, so she swallowed quite a few bites with minimal chewing. Downing her water, she pulled on her shoes and bolted out the door.

******

As the bus came to a stop at The Corner, Kelly stepped off and took a deep breath of the early morning air. She'd more then managed to make it on time to her stop, and had a nice, relaxing ride to campus. Now that she was here, it was time to start reversing her recent weight gain, and get back into shape.

Kelly began walking towards the gym. She was in a pretty good mood. The sun was shining, the birds were singing, the gym was closed for renovations... Wait, what!?

Kelly stood in front of the large campus gym. It was clearly locked, all the lights were off, and there was a sign on the door that said quite clearly: CLOSED FOR RENOVATIONS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. There was also some spiel about "sorry for the inconvenience" and what not, but Kelly was not focused on that part.

Oh no! What am I going to do now? How can you have a diet and exercise plan without exercise? Kelly thought while her mind ignored the general lack of "diet" in her plan as well. Kelly chewed her lip a little in thought. Seeing a passerby on the sidewalk, Kelly said, "Excuse me, do you know when the gym is supposed to reopen?"

The man's eyes widened a little at the cute girl before him. "No clue, I'm afraid. Building's just too old. Apparently a rafter broke off and nearly crushed a guy. They've been working on it since last year." Kelly's heart sank as the man put finger quotations around the word, "working."

"Well, do you know of any gym in town I can go to?"

"There's a couple around, but they aren't cheap. Cheapest one I know is something like $500 a month, and at least one breaks $1,000." Kelly's jaw dropped. That was more then her dorm fees!

"Geez! Well, thanks anyway," Kelly said sincerely, leaving the poor guy who was still trying to work up the nerve to ask her to coffee in the dust. Well, that was a bust. And I was trying so hard to make this work. Kelly felt a slight jiggle from her ass as she walked across campus. Guess all I can do for now is watch what I eat. Like not eat an entire pizza for breakfast...

Kelly groaned as that thought passed through her mind, and glared at her stomach accusingly. I'd completely forgotten about that! Damn it! Damn it, you bottomless bastard! Why do you keep doing this to me!? Seriously, what am I going to do?

Frustrated, Kelly sat on a nearby bench to ponder her predicament. She felt all too aware of how wide her ass was, and that it kept her from getting right to the back of the seat. She started to hyperventilate a little. Well... okay... just calm down. Breathe. Panicking has never helped anyone. Damage is already done anyway, nothing I can do about it now. For right now, that's all you can do, just watch what you eat. Get some more vegetables in your diet, and cut way back on the desserts. And I should call Mom and Dad. I can't afford those gym prices, but maybe they'd pay for me. And for all I know, the campus gym could be running by next week. That guy said they've been working on it since last year. They've got to be close to getting it done.

Filled with a renewed sense of hope, Kelly got up from her seat. She didn't feel as large as she had only a few moments ago, and her stomach no longer felt like a ball of lead. Well, she thought, since my gym plans have been ruined, I might as well tour the campus and figure out where all my classes are. And, bonus, all that walking is exercise!

And so, Kelly took out her map and class schedule and had herself a private tour of the campus.

******

Man, my feet hurt.

Kelly once again rested on the same bench at the end of her campus tour. She felt bushed, but happy. She not only knew how to get to all of her classes, but she'd given herself quite the workout, easily cancelling out the pizza she'd eaten. Or rather, so she thought.

Though Kelly was unaware of it, she was in absolutely terrible shape. Not engaging in any serious physical activity since Grade 10, and being very lackluster with regards to effort beforehand, will do that to a person. In actual fact, she'd only walked about three miles. Now, the average person will burn approximately 100 calories in a mile, meaning Kelly only burned about 300 calories or so over the course of her entire campus tour, which is honestly not all that much, especially when you realize that the pizza she'd consumed for breakfast had over 10x as many calories in it, just a little over 3200. This is to say nothing of its content of fat, sugar, salt and cholesterol, each one of which is well in excess of what an average person's maximum daily intake is supposed to be by a fair margin.

Blissfully ignorant of these facts and feeling a mite peckish, Kelly checked the time. Seeing that it was almost nine, and convinced she'd already dealt with the pizza, she decided to grab breakfast at the campus dining hall. She had already paid for it, after all. It'd be a waste not to use it.

145112121122.content:
Kelly walked into the dining hall, which smelt amazing right now, and got her place in line. As she made her way down the line, she loaded her tray with pancakes, bacon, sausage, a large chocolate muffin, and some grapefruit.

Convinced that she had prepared a healthy breakfast, Kelly sat at a table. Covering her grapefruit in a mountain of sugar, she spread a thick smear of butter on top of each of her pancakes as she ate her fruit. Once her pancakes had a sizeable amount of butter on each, she restacked them and reached for the maple syrup. In her defense, she did grab the bottle of light syrup and used that. However, she found the taste not to her liking, and promptly poured the standard maple syrup on her pancakes, leaving them absolutely soaked in the sugary substance. She used her bacon and sausage to soak up the excess syrup after she'd eaten her pancakes, and finally turned to her muffin for dessert. It was a huge, dark thing, loaded with chocolate chips and caramel; really, it was like eating a slice of cake with breakfast.

Kelly, however, saw no problem with enjoying the terribly fattening muffin. In her mind, she'd been quite good today. She had gotten up early, and sure, the gym had been closed, but she'd gotten a good, long walk in. She'd eaten a proper breakfast with fruit and she'd used light syrup on her pancakes (in her mind, only watering down the light stuff slightly with the standard), so she was totally justified in eating her muffin for dessert. Unwrapping the delectable treat, she bit into the warm, gooey pastry. Mmm, that is so good!

Despite the huge size of the muffin, she finished it off quickly. Checking the time, Kelly saw it was nearly ten. With the gym currently closed, there was little reason to stay on campus at the moment, and her bus would be here soon. She got up and made her way over to the exit. A long row of rollers for busing your trays ran alongside the wall by the exit, and there were a couple of trays already waiting with their dirty dishes. One of the trays, though, had another of the chocolate-caramel muffins sitting on it, still in its wrapper.

Now who would waste a muffin like that? If you're not going to eat it, why grab it? Kelly thought as she looked at the treat. Looking around the nearly empty dining hall, she bit her lower lip as she looked at the tempting treat. She knew she shouldn't, but it was totally untouched. It wasn't like she was eating off someone's used plate. And no one was looking at her, so its not like she'd be judged for it. Decision made, she set her tray right beside the muffin one, and in one swift movement grabbed the sugary treasure. Unwrapping her second muffin of the day, she sunk her teeth into it as she made her way outside.

******

Kelly's trip back to the apartment was uneventful. Few people were riding the bus this early on a Saturday, so she'd had nearly the entire vehicle to herself. As she got off the elevator on her floor, she slid her key card into her door and walked inside.

"Hi!" Kelly beamed as she saw her room mates were up and at it. The girls were sitting in the kitchen in various states of dress, and the boxes of leftover pizza were spread out on the kitchen table.

"Good, you made it just in time," Susan said. In the short time they'd been together in the building, Susan was already becoming something of the apartment's matriarch. "Grab a slice of pizza. We're clearing some room in the fridge, then after those of us that haven't yet showered do so, we're going to make a grocery run."

Kelly's stomach growled hungrily at the thought of more food even as she mentally froze up. Thinking of all she'd eaten so far today, Kelly said, "I really shouldn't. I already had some leftovers this morning, and I had a bite to eat on campus before coming back."

"Oh, c'mon, you can have a slice. Seriously, one slice. Every little bit helps." Susan seemed almost pleading in her attempts to make Kelly eat even more pizza. To be fair, the boxes did take up a ton of space in the fridge, and left little room for anything else. And it was good pizza, and totally free. Plus, her new friends needed her. Heck, three of them couldn't even touch the bulk of the leftovers.

"Okay, but just a slice." Kelly dropped her gym bag to the floor and joined her housemates at the table. The small circle of friends chatted about their plans for the day. Kelly told the girls about the campus gym being closed, and the fitness conscious amongst them discussed potential gyms in town and what to do in the meantime. As they talked, Kelly wasn't paying attention to how much she ate. Kelly...

153.content:
Kelly Miller had been pretty big for a long time.

No, scratch that. She'd been pretty FAT for a long time.

She hadn't always been so rotund. Granted, she'd been a fairly round child according to her Mom, which she then confirmed with a whole series of embarrassing childhood photos. However, Kelly had slimmed down all through elementary school. She was probably one of the fastest girls in school, though she didn't do much with it. She played a little soccer back then, but she never really took to it full time.

She couldn't help but think that perhaps if she had, she might be a very different person then she is now.

Kelly had also grown like a weed throughout her elementary years. By the time she was in grade six, she was almost five feet tall, and she had reached 5'4" by the time she entered Grade 8.

And that was about where she stopped growing up and, unfortunately for her, when she started growing out.

Though she tended to pinpoint her expanding waistline to middle school, in truth it had its beginnings even before then. She took to video games at an early age. Her parents, Robert and Essy (her Mom hated being called Esther), did little to curtail their daughter's recreational choice. Both were working full-time and pretty terrible hours at that, leaving her elder brother Andrew to look after her fairly frequently.

Andrew was a fairly nice guy, though like many teens, was far from the most health conscious, and totally unable to cook. Supper with Andrew was either fast food or frozen meals, generally served in portions fit for a starving teenage male, and well in excess of what Kelly herself needed in both sheer quantity and calories.

Years of practice allowed her to keep up with her bro in terms of consumption, and her waistline showed the inevitable after effects. Even by the 8th grade, the fairly scrawny and lanky little girl had gotten pretty chubby, her ever-increasing height the only thing keeping her weight gain somewhat at bay. All the people she hung out with, from her brother to her friends, were gamers like her, so her physical activity was next to nil. No alarm bells were set off with her folks, as her grades were simply stellar. Why would they, or anyone else for that matter, worry about Kelly?

Of course, the inevitable happened. Kelly reached her max height, and her body had to figure out what to do with all the excess calories she was consuming. Matters were made even worse when Kelly dropped gym class in grade 9, eliminating much of what little physical activity she had left. From here on out, Kelly was a growing girl, though in a very different way.

She was consistent all through the end of middle school and her high school years, steadily gaining a pound or two a month, with a large spike November through February. Kelly was constantly shopping for new clothes, but she seldom wore them out; she was simply outgrowing them again and again.

Discomfort over her expanding body led her to try and eat her weight gain fears. Pretty soon, she was daily out-eating Andrew, and it was a sad day for her when she out-weighed her brother part way through Grade 10. Between that and the relentless cruelty of her classmates, Kelly's consumption only rose. Her mealtime portions expanded, and seconds became the norm. Likewise, she soon found herself constantly snacking during her gaming sessions, watching movies, even while reading a book or studying.

Her weight loss attempts always ended in failure. Kelly's poor willpower made sticking to a diet nearly impossible, and she always managed to end her diets even heavier then when she started. And to say her two or three attempts at exercise went badly would be an understatement. The last time she tried in high school was just after her boyfriend broke up with her for getting too fat. She barely managed 30 yards before quitting, and promptly went home and ordered pizza.

By the time Kelly graduated, she weighed in at a whopping 270 pounds. She didn't think she was the biggest girl in the school, as some of the ones who played rugby were real monsters. However, thanks to being significantly shorter then those girls, Kelly looked far broader, and her jiggly frame was certainly far less capable. Waddling from one side of the school to the other left her winded, and the endless barrage of comments she received certainly made her glad high school was over.

And so, Kelly spent her summer doing what she'd always done: play some games, read a little, and eat a lot. She didn't worry about the consequences. After all, she was already so fat. What more could she do to herself?

1533.content:
Kelly groaned as her family's old analog scale settled on 330 pounds. "Oh my f*cking God. Are you serious?"

Kelly was currently only dressed in her underwear. It was a rather unflattering set in plain white, bought at the local big box store. She looked in the mirror as she contemplated the scale's blunt assessment of her mass. Her wide hips just fit into the narrow bathroom mirror, and she knew if she turned around, she'd see her large butt protruding far to the back and sides. Her thick thighs pressed firmly into each other, and along with her hips, forced her into a heavy waddle the few times a day she had to move.

Moving her gaze upward, Kelly looked at her heavy belly. Her gut was divided into a trio of large rolls. The lowest and largest of the rolls was beginning to droop heavily under gravity, and she had to physically lift it if she wanted to see her hidden panties, much to her embarrassment. Her belly seemed to be expanding by the day, laying claim to more of her lap every time she sat down. Annoyingly, her lap seemed just as eager to expand, and maintain the proper belly-coverage-to-exposed-lap ratio.

Perhaps the only positive Kelly could think of as her gaze rose further, was her breasts. As she'd packed on the pounds, her boobs had taken a fair share of her new bulk. The bra she was currently wearing was a D, and she'd clearly outgrown it, as her jiggly flesh was bulging from the top and sides of the cups. With their mass being mostly composed of fat, her boobs did little to support themselves, though thankfully (if that was the word for it) her belly was a more then adequate support for the lardy things.

That said, any joy she felt from their girth was overshadowed by the rest of her.

Her arms had thickened significantly, especially her upper arms. She reached over with her right hand and gave a jiggle to her left's sagging wing, noting with distaste just how easily the blubbery flesh moved. "Christ, even my hands seem a little chubbier."

As she looked at her chubby cheeks and developing second chin, Kelly couldn't help but wonder and hope, "Maybe the scale is wrong? These old things were never exactly accurate. I mean, yeah, I'm big, but to gain 60 pounds in a summer is crazy. That'd be a pound every couple of days. There's no way that can be right. Right?"

Kelly thought back to how she spent her last summer before college. Staying up late playing games, sleeping in until ten or so. Grazing constantly on chips and snack cakes. Downing pop by the case. Bag of McGriddles for breakfast. Bag of burgers for lunch. Bucket of fried chicken in the afternoon, pizza late in the evenings.

Eating, eating, eating.

Never moving more then the few steps between her computer chair and the bathroom.

Well, except when she made a fast food run, and that hardly counts as exercise.

Kelly looked between the scale and her visage in the mirror. She ran her hand across her belly, giving her overstuffed rolls a shake. "... well, it may be accurate. God damn it."

Flicking off the bathroom light, Kelly plodded slowly back to her bedroom, feeling her expansive cheeks wobbling with each heavy footfall. Squeezing through her bedroom door, she felt her hips grazing the frame as she made her way through. She settled into her computer chair with a sigh, feeling the arms dig into her wide hips as she did so. She powered on her PC, feeling her booty drooping over the side of her seat as she waited.

One the left side of her desk were two pizza boxes, both extra large pepperonis with extra meat and cheese. To her right was an open family sized bag of dill pickle chips and half a 2L of cream soda. She'd already started into the pizza when she was struck with a sudden desire to know her weight, and she grabbed another slice for her every hungry maw, hardly about to break her bad habits tonight.

"If that scale is right, and I put on 60 pounds... I mean, holy shit. That's insane. I've got to do something and get this under control. Otherwise I'll be as big as a house by Christmas."

"Tomorrow, though. Definitely tomorrow."

*** *** ***

"Kelly! Let's go! I want to get there before dark!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming," Kelly gasped as she heaved her flabby frame up the basement stairs. She'd been dutifully avoiding noticing how much more she'd been struggling with the stairs lately, and after several trips, she was really regretting that decision. Getting to the landing, she let out a final gasp, grateful she didn't have to take them again.

Taking a moment to catch her breath, she went outside. Her brother, Andrew, was waiting by his truck. Both siblings had black hair and blue eyes, and had clearly taken after their mother's Greek heritage. He was a fair bit taller then his sister, just a hair over six feet. He was also half her weight, much to her annoyance. "As if I needed a reminder just how fat I am."

Andrew's truck was an old Chevy with a trailer cap over the box, and it was currently full with the two students' baggage. Despite being a fair bit older then his sister, Andrew was only a sophomore at college. Lacking his sibling's exceptional grades, Andrew had gone to work for a couple of years to earn the needed funds for school.

Kelly, meanwhile, had easily earned a number of academic scholarships, and was able to go on to post-secondary immediately out of high school.

Andrew raised an eyebrow at her as she loaded the last of her luggage. The bulk of the truck was easily his stuff, and his sister had loaded only a single duffel bag of clothes. "Is that all you're taking?"

"Um, yes," Kelly answered, slightly red in the face, though she wasn't sure if it was from embarrassment or exhaustion. She didn't have the stomach to tell her brother that she'd gotten too fat for the bulk of her wardrobe. It had been quite a rude surprise when she started packing earlier in the week. Kelly had spent most of her holiday in leggings and a stretchy tank top, though she'd swapped out the leggings for a pair of her Dad's sweats when they split down the sides. Even though it should have been obvious, it was only as she was trying on her old clothes that the scale of her gain became readily apparent.

She was currently wearing her largest remaining articles, and even these had gotten rather tight. Kelly had stuffed herself into her largest remaining jeans, which were digging painfully into her waist. Her tank top was skin tight, and it was a struggle to keep her lower belly roll covered by the shirt, attempts at forcing the roll into her pants having failed utterly.

Kelly was also wearing one of her Dad's hoodies, which thankfully was still a little large on her. "Except the sleeves," Kelly thought as her body reminded her why she hated sleeves so much. She could feel a sheen of sweat forming on her skin already, her well-insulated body not appreciating the extra layer. However, she really didn't want Andrew to see just how huge she'd made herself in such a short time. Honestly, Kelly was just thankful that Andrew's own body ran so hot, as it was guaranteed he'd have the truck's a/c cranked the entire journey.

"It's not like I need to pack that much. I can grab anything I lack at the campus store. Well, shall we get going? We're burning daylight, after all."

"Alright," Andrew said as he climbed into the truck. Kelly let out a breath she didn't know she'd been holding and joined him in the front. As she sat in the truck, Kelly felt her booty spread across the seat. One cheek was squished by the door. The other, meanwhile, was trying to rise over the center counsel. She felt her blush get worse as she struggled to put on her seat belt, as the buckle was hidden under her butt a good ways.

Her arm fat had the sleeves of the hoodie skintight, and Kelly was worried her sweat was dampening the material noticeably. She looked at herself in the vehicle's mirror, not happy with what she saw. "Jesus, I look like the Stay Puft Marshmallow Man."

*** *** ***

Her humiliation get worse when, a couple hours into their journey, the Miller's stopped for lunch at a nearby McDonald's. Kelly pushed her diet plan once more back to tomorrow, and ordered a pair of double quarter pounders with cheese, a large fries, a large chocolate shake, and three apple pies.

As she devoured her considerable fast food feast, Kelly felt a large rip from the front, and her pants felt far looser and more comfortable afterwards. She discretely ran a hand under her shirt, making sure Andrew didn't see her doing it, confirming that the button on her pants had just popped off. Had it not been for her shirt and hoodie, the button would have ricocheted off the glove box of the truck.

"Oh my f*cking God."

*** *** ***

Out of curiosity, where are the siblings attending college?
